library.name: jsy

library.description: A simple, lightweight jQuery plugin for reading, writing and deleting cookies.
library.name: jquery.cookie

library.description: Simple localStorage, sessionStorage and cookie operating library with the single API.
library.name: strg.js

library.description: Cookies.js is a small client-side javascript library that makes managing cookies easy. Compatible with all major browsers (and not so major browsers, like IE 6), the minified library weighs in at less than 1 KB when gzipped. Cookies.js also supports AMD and CommonJS loaders.
library.name: Cookies.js

library.description: A highly modular, loosely coupled, non-frameworky framework for building advanced JavaScript apps.
library.name: Ampersand.js

library.description: < 1KB lightweight, fast & powerful JavaScript templating engine with zero dependencies. Compatible with server-side environments like node.js, module loaders like RequireJS and all web browsers.
library.name: JavaScript-Templates

library.description: Pocket is a high performance storage library. It provides an API which resembles MongoDB's proven syntax and provides a powerful lightweight abstraction from the complexity of storage. Pocket support multiple methods of storage including localStorage, Web SQL, Cordova SQLite plugin and IndexedDB.
library.name: PocketJS
